name: location_inquiry
description: Responses for when a user asks about salon location
responses: We're located at 123 Beauty Boulevard, Styleville, ST 12345. We're in the shopping plaza next to the grocery store, with plenty of free parking available.
Our salon is at 123 Beauty Boulevard in Styleville. We're easily accessible by public transportation - the #42 bus stops right in front of our salon.
You'll find us at 123 Beauty Boulevard in Styleville (ST 12345). We're on the corner of Beauty Blvd and Style Street, with a large pink sign out front.
Delane Nails is located at 123 Beauty Boulevard, Styleville. We have free parking behind the building and we're wheelchair accessible.
